name: Scorpio
description: Melard, known as Scorpio, embodies cold-blooded creatures. One glimpse of her face awakens deep, frequent dread and reveals her devastating power.

skills.name: Stealthy Scorpion
skills.description: Scorpio gains a shield that absorbs DMG up to 300% ATK.

upgrades.level2: Reduces nearby enemies' ATK by 20% for 6s when the shield breaks. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Shield Strength increases to 330% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.141)

skills.name: Tail Sting
skills.description: Scorpio slashes the nearest enemy, dealing three instances of DMG equal to 100% ATK, followed by a powerful thrust that deals 210% ATK as DMG.

upgrades.level2: Increases the thrust DMG to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Increases the thrust DMG to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.101)

skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.description: At combat start, Scorpio blinks to the symmetric position behind an enemy, dealing 220% ATK as DMG and stunning them for 2s. This skill fails if no enemy is at that position.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 280% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)
